so embryonic stem cells are really um

an extremely New
Field in 1998 human embryonic stem cells

so basically what he did was to take a

cell and he recapitulated the disease
over and over again in the dish and uh
this was extraordinary because it was
the first time that we had a model of a

that actually the motor neurons were
dying in the disease in a different way

there was another kind of cell that
